Messages.Author: Tim Christian Dockenfuﬂ
Messages.Content: Dear students, there will be no lecture tomorrow on May 23rd.  Next wednesday (May 29th), we will handout the prototyping and reading assignment. Try and find a partner to do your prototyping assignment with until then.  Kind regards, Tim Dockenfuﬂ

Messages.Author: Nils Japke
Messages.Content: Dear students, Sadly, we have to cancel today's lecture on short notice. The next lecture will be next week on May 2 (Thu), as May 1 is a public holiday. Best regards, Nils Japke

Messages.Author: Nils Japke
Messages.Content: Dear students, We finished the selection process for this semester's Fog Computing lecture based on the skills you reported in the survey, and also by random assignment if multiple students reported a similar skill set. If you have been selected, you should have received an additional message via another internal forum only visible to the selected students. If you have not been selected, we will try to offer slots to more students in case selected participants cancel their registrations. Otherwise, you are welcome to try again next time. You can also join the remaining zoom lectures, but you cannot take any exams.  Best regards, Nils Japke

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Registration Survey & No Lecture on April 18

Messages.Author: Nils Japke
Messages.Content: Dear students, Due to a technical problem, we have now opened a second (Repeat) Registration Survey. If you have filled out the original survey, but want to change your answer, you can use the Repeat Registration Survey to submit a new answer. There, you can also update your answer after submission. Sadly, we cannot update this setting in the original survey. For the registration, we will take your newest submission on either survey into account. If you filled out the original survey, and are happy with your submission, you do not need to do anything. As announced before, we will complete the slot assignment on April 19 (Fri). We have updated the deadline of the survey to April 19, 8am, so that you have a couple more hours, but to be safe, please fill out the survey tomorrow! Also, there will be no lecture tomorrow, April 18 (Thu). Best regards, Nils Japke

Messages.Author: Tim Christian Dockenfuﬂ
Messages.Content: Dear students, thank you for your interest in our course Fog Computing. This course will start with a Kick-Off session at April 17, 16:15h (Wed), where we present all organizational aspects. We will have no session on Thursday this week, as you will still be filling out the registration survey at this point. The Kick-Off session (and the lecture going forward) will be held digitally via Zoom (Link: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/68919616987?pwd=TWg4YUROMzRMbVV3ZUVQeGdhd0ZkQT09). As we have only limited seats available, we assign course participation based on a Registration Survey (starting after the Kick-Off). Please note that we want to announce the number of participants quickly, so the survey closes a day later at April 18 (Thu)! We will announce the confirmed participants on April 19 (Fri). The first lecture will be next Wednesday (April 24th). Best regards, Tim Dockenfuﬂ

Messages.Author: Siar-Remzi Akbayin
Messages.Content: If someone ist still looking for a group partner and willing to work with me, feel free to join group 12.

Messages.Author: Niklas Blume
Messages.Content: Hey :) I'm looking for a motivated group partner for the prototyping assignment. Feel free to join Group 14 and DM me. Best regards Niklas

Messages.Author: Yevhenii Klymenko
Messages.Content: Hey everyone, I'm looking for a partner for the prototyping assignment. If you are also looking for a group, feel free to message me and join group 6. Best regards Yevhenii

Messages.Author: Christopher-Julian M¸ller
Messages.Content: Hey, I'm looking for a motivated group mate to do the prototyping assignment. If you'd like to team up, dont hesitate to join Group 2 in the group tool and leave me a notification on ISIS :) Best regards, Christopher

Messages.Author: Max Henri Julian Hiort
Messages.Content: Hello, I am looking for a partner to do the assignment. I did cloud computing last semester, so I have some experience for the prototyping. If you are interested in teaming up just text me. Max

Discussions.Discussion_Name: looking for a study partner for prototyping assignment

Messages.Author: Melisa Akbaydar
Messages.Content: Hello, I am looking for a partner to do the prototyping assignment, please write to me if you are also looking for a partner and would like to team up.
